Access Control.Owner Functions: The onlyOwner modifier restricts certain functions to the contract owner, including AdjustBetAmounts, AdjustDifficulty, and transferAnyERC20Token.

User Verification.Only Real People: The onlyRealPeople modifier ensures that contracts cannot interact, protecting against flash loan or bot attacks.

Implemented Security Controls.Open to Public Toggle: The isOpenToPublic modifier allows the contract owner to open or close the game to public participation.

Fallback Functionality: A default payable fallback function allows ETH deposits but without custom logic.
